chunks.chunk_text: Hello you guys, and welcome to another episode of 15 Minutes Cafe。每週三來到15 Minutes Cafe英語咖啡館,喝一杯老師們的主題特調,一起探討國際文化、時事職涯、網路和音樂等多元主題輕鬆吸收主題相關的詞彙、慣用語和常用例句。Today we have Clem in the house, welcome!
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: So recently, Taiwan has been on the map for AI, and of course, apart from AI, we are also on CNN for a variety of other things, thanks to Mr. Huang, because Mr. Huang likes to visit the night markets and the restaurants, so apart from the attention to AI that he's getting around the world, people are also checking out what Jensen's been having on all his past trips to Taiwan.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: And recently, it's been putting Taiwan on the foodie map all over, I think Hong Kong people, Singaporean friends, and all the people in Southeast Asia, they are now coming to Taiwan to try all these foods.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: I have to admit, I'm sorry, thanks to Jensen, I now learn about a few restaurants that I should try.You should try night market.I've always gone to the night market.Ninsha night market, no doubt about that.Hands down, the best night market in the world, but apart from the night markets, you know, some restaurants he visited, I've never heard of people mentioning them, maybe because I can't afford it, for one, and also maybe because
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: I have such a variety in Taiwan, Taipei, for example, you don't have to go to a special dumpling store for dumplings, because there are so many dumpling stores nearby where you live, so you can choose the nearest dumpling store to have.You don't have to go across districts or across cities to go hunt down dumplings, but thanks to Mr. Huang, now there are long lines at these dumpling stores and noodle stores.Thanks to Mr.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: Jensen Huang, he's obviously a gourmet himself, right?He's a big foodie, and he's been promoting Taiwan food forever.So thank you, Mr.Wang.Great of you to promote our Taiwan cuisine.But, Clem, what is the downside of all this buzz around Taiwan food?Don't you think the prices would go up?I don't think so.I think Jensen Huang's store, his visit is very affordable.Okay.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: Since you talked about the food map, so we will cover the food map for those of you who aren't aware of Jensen's food map, okay?Like me, I had to be educated about the food map.So let's start with Jensen's food map.So this is going to be a food map that we're going to include down below.You can check it out in the description box.And maybe as this episode airs, we will also upload it as the Instagram story on our 15mins Instagram account.So guys, starting from the
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: left.Take it away, Clem.What is the first one on the left?Okay.The first store is Zouji Cuisine.Zouji Cuisine.Okay.Sounds like a dumpling store or a noodle store.It used to be a noodle store.Okay.And now it is a?And now it is a private kitchen.Oh, now it's a private kitchen.Yeah.And what style of cuisine do they offer?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: It says Zhejiang style, right?And Zhejiang style is more like Shanghai style?Shanghai style.Yeah, most likely.So when we talk about a private kitchen, Clem, have you ever had any food at a private kitchen?I've tried once.How do you feel about private kitchens?Very expensive.For starters, the pricing is also very private kitchen, right?It's not a dumpling store.It's a private kitchen dumpling store.And what else about
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: a private kitchen is so special?A fixed menu.So they have a fixed menu.Do you pay per person or pay per table?Yeah, somebody took me to the private kitchen.So you didn't book the private kitchen yourself?Yeah.Obviously you didn't pay, but did you know how much?And I remember it is about two thousand five dollars.Two thousand five hundred dollars.Yeah.Would you consider that expensive as a meal in Taiwan?Finally not.But for
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: a little food, I think it's quite expensive.Yes.If you talk about fine dining, what is the price range in Taiwan?Just to give everybody out there, our listeners also in Singapore, Hong Kong and in Southeast Asia to know what is the price range for fine dining or private kitchen type styled restaurants in Taipei?I think the price is about two thousand, three thousand.Two to three thousand eighty dollars.Yes.That's not bad.That's eighty
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: to hundred US.Really?Yeah.Seventy to hundred US.That's not too bad, I guess.I've obviously heard if we talk about private kitchen that's possibly even Michelin recommended, that's another level, right?That's probably ten thousand eighty dollars per person.So excluding the wine and beverage.Okay.Because that gets really expensive if you start drinking wine and buy Joe and all that.So that was Zouji Cuisine.Private kitchen.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: You guys check it out.Zhejiang style.So if you like traditional Shanghai style Chinese food, you go on ahead.But private kitchen for me out.Too rich for my blood.All right.Let's move on.The next one.And the next one is Taiwan style restaurant.It means Gugu.Oh, the name is Gugu.Yeah.It sounds very Taiwanese.Gugu, right?Gugu.Not like Gugu Gaga, Gugu.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: All right.They say 无菜单料理。What exactly does it mean?无菜单料理。Is it private kitchen?Not exactly private kitchen.无菜单比较像是它有个固定的价位,但是老板看着心情它不一定你每次去到都是一样的菜色。When we talk about 无菜单,right?The no menu situation,technically,technically it sounds like,okay,the chef has his own menu,but you don't get to know it.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: beforehand.And obviously,there's a fixed price that you pay for dinner or for lunch.And it's up to the chef to decide what you are having for the day.You have no say.Oh,well,you can sort of say no,because maybe you have dietary restrictions,for example,your lactose intolerant.Maybe you're a vegetarian.When you book these restaurants,you have to tell the chef in advance,right?Because they will follow whatever is a seasonal food and they will crew.They're pretty
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: much creative foods,okay?So these type of restaurants,we say,they are restaurants with chef'stasting menu,or if you want to be fancy in French,it's carte blanche.So carte blanche meaning a blank document or blank check.And it's up to the chef to draw on it.And you can also use a Japanese word means omakase.Ah,yes,in Taiwan,we like to use that word.One time I was shocked.I went to one of the Japanese
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: restaurants and then they said,are you having omakase today?And I'm like,what the heck is that?I'm having sushi,not omakase.Hello.So anyways,I was educated.In Taiwan,we can also call that omakase.But for those people in the West who don't know what omakase is,maybe you go for the chef'stasting menu or the chef's menu.They probably go for that.Let's talk about Google.Taiwanese style.What do you think?For Taiwanese style food,is it worthwhile to go to a private kitchen of sorts or
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: omakase?For me,no.Not really,right?Because we live in Taiwan.Because I can cook myself.We can cook by ourselves or our moms are pretty good cooks.So Taiwanese style food,not really.Let's put it this way.But for Jensen,I think if he didn't get to taste the Taiwanese style fine dining,it's very hard for him to talk to his mom,right?Or share something with his mom.So no worries,Jensen,good for you.This might not be for us.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: The next one is for me though,because my dad is crazy about the next store.So your dad likes to go to Nishanai Mall kid?Not really,but let me tell you a back story.My dad grew up at the Taipei Circle.So his childhood,half of his childhood was at the Taipei Circle.The old circle.So he would tell us all these stories about my grandpa.At that time,we had a store.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: And he would remember these things.So he would be looking for that flavor,the flavor that he used to have as a child near the circle.But we tried stealing night market.We tried Raohe night market.We went to all the night markets.He couldn't find it.And then we found it at Ningxia.One time I told my dad and I said,hey,this store says it's from the old circle.Maybe you want to try it.And then he literally,he almost cried when he tasted it.Really?Yeah.And he was like,this is what I have been waiting for.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: He was ecstatic.He finally found his childhood memory.So John,do you like oyster omelette?Okay.So the next restaurant we're talking about is oyster omelette store at Ningxia night market.It's called,in English,it's called TW street food.Okay.Well,Taiwan street food,I guess.But the name is Yuan Huan Bian.So it's,you know,circle side,on the side of the circle.Taipei Circle by Taipei main station used to be the CBD,the old downtown of Taipei.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: Oh.Yeah.So that's where my dad grew up,a part of his childhood.And that's what he remembered.And then this store has been around for ages,right?So the flavor,the sauce,the oyster omelette has been more traditional compared to the modern stuff that we have at other night markets.So talking about oyster omelette.Oyster omelette,not my favorite.Taiwanese street food,to be honest.Oh,what's your favorite Taiwanese street food?My favorite has to go to stinky tofu.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: It's so crispy.It's so juicy.And there are a variety of stinky tofu.You know,you get stinky tofu that are triangular.Some are square.Some are crispy on the outside,soft on the inside.Some are like cookies.You know,they get fried really,really well.And it's like cookies.I love the variety.Stinky tofu is the best for me.But obviously for my dad,this oyster omelette store is the best.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: And for Jensen too.My dad is 10,12 years older than Jensen.So they are sort of the same generation,I guess.So what's your favorite at Ningxia?My favorite at Ningxia.Jensen也有去這家店。Which one?Bao jiang xiao huang guo you yu de.Crispy cucumber squid?Yes,squid.With cucumber inside and fried it.Juicy cucumber inside the squid and fried.Fried squid.What the?That sounds so weird.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: Oh,I told you.That is very,very juicy.I can't imagine with the cucumber on the inside.Sure.Okay.Jensen is very adventurous,I must say.You know,at least he's willing to try.You know,cucumber in a squid.So Ningxia,what would you have at Ningxia,Clem?I think tofu pudding.Do you like it?Tofu pudding?No problem.I mean,I'm a big fan.Dessert-wise,everywhere I go,it's tofu pudding with boba,with tofu pudding,with whatever.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: That's my base.I always need some of that.But why don't I remember dou hua zhuang?That's weird.I went there a couple of times.Well,okay.I must have missed it.That is a very famous shop.Really?I must have missed it.Or maybe because the lines are too long.Sometimes I just stay away from long lines,to be honest.The circle side always
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: the omelet that I have to buy for my dad.So I stood in line last time for 25 minutes.25 minutes.It's not bad,but I don't like to wait.Oh,you don't have patience.I'm not patient enough for that.There's another store at Ningxia that we have to talk about.It's the fruit lady.The fruit lady.The fruit lady.That's on the news this time.Actually,it's not Ningxia.It's tong hua ye shi.Oh,okay.I must have
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: mistaken.I thought everything like all the fruit and everything that he went that Jensen had was at Ningxia.So this time it's tong hua.Okay.So do you remember what happened?What the news was about where Jensen went to the night market and then he gave a very generous tip,right?Yeah.For the lady.And do you remember how big the tip was?I couldn't remember it.Five thousand NT.Holy.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: So Jensen is a very generous man.He loved the fruit so much.He literally just tipped her five thousand NT dollars.There are a lot of news about Jensen being a very generous tipper.Even though there's no tipping culture in Taiwan.You don't need to tip in Taiwan.But Jensen made it a point and said,look,this lady's been cutting fruit like this and it's amazing.Her fruits are so fresh and delicious.And then
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: did you know what happened a few days after Jensen visited this lady?You know what happened?The media went back to this lady,the fruit lady,and she actually complained.She said she cut so much fruit in the past two days after Jensen left.It's not even funny.She says she might have to go see a doctor because she hurt her wrist cutting fruit.So her business got so good.

chunks.chunk_text: Thanks to Jensen that she almost hurt her wrist.She's got to go see the doctor.Okay.So treat your fruit ladies nice,people,please.When you go to night markets,treat your fruit ladies nice.The next one on the food map list is a little off.It's not in Taipei.It's in Shenzhong.So what's in Shenzhong?Okay.Braised pork on rice,which is something you can have in Taipei.

chunks.chunk_text: I'm curious.Okay.Because for me,braised pork on rice is braised pork on rice.In Taipei,it's pretty much the same thing.But obviously,this seems like the luxury version.Please let me know.Moving on.We got dumplings finally.We got dumpling store,right?Because if you come to Taiwan,you have to go to Ding Taifeng,dumpling,Xiaolongbao,and steamed buns,baozi.That's the key.So which store did Jensen visit?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: Liyuan Dumpling Store is near Taipei Arena,and Taipei Arena is where we go for our concerts.Jackie Chung concert recently,cool concert,you go to Taipei Arena.When you get out of the concert hall,you can probably go to Liyuan Dumpling Store.Now here's the thing.What's so special about this dumpling store?I think the special of Liyuan is,have you ever heard the oyster and omelet xiaolongbao?Oyster omelet xiaolongbao?Yeah.Are you crazy?How do you mix
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: the two together?Xiaolongbao is xiaolongbao.That's crazy.So they have a fusion xiaolongbao.Yes.Wow.Super cool.Oyster omelet xiaolongbao.All right.But I heard that Jensen's got a Jensen menu,right?Jensen menu.Yeah.Yes.You know,this is a story I was told by my client.So you know Jensen went to Liyuan,right?And then he took a photo,and a lot of people saw him there.And then a day later,my client's wife
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: said,hey,this is very close to our house.We should go and check it out.We've never had Liyuan.So my client decided,okay,let's take a walk and go get Liyuan Dumplings.He said when he arrived at the store,there was this huge long line for takeaway and another line for sit downs.And then I asked him,did you buy takeaway or did you wait for a sit down?And he said,well,of course takeaway.And I said,how long did you have to wait for the takeaway?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: He said 40 minutes.No way.My next question to my client was,so what did you buy?And he said,you just go there and ask for the Jensen Huang menu.The Huang LaoBan menu.Yeah.Whatever he had,I want to have.And apparently most people who bought takeaway bought the Jensen Huang menu.They bought whatever Jensen Huang bought.They were curious as to what he ate.So they bought xiaolongbao.Yeah.They bought all the stuff he wanted.That's it.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: They just bought everything he at and that's it.They thought that was the signature dishes,but actually maybe not,that's just Jensen's favorite.Not Liyuan's signature dishes.But obviously you go to a dumpling store,most of the time,the dishes are their signature dishes,they survive for such a long time.So again,for those of you who grew up knowing Liyuan,I didn't grow up knowing Liyuan.For those of you who grew up knowing Liyuan.

chunks.chunk_text: 我們50分鐘的粉絲,請讓我們知道,你通常要什麼?或者你只要說,給我精神光的菜單精神光的包裝讓我們知道所以我們有另一個,我相信這也有一點像是廚房或是私人廚房,對嗎?不,我覺得是小小的社會餐廳哦,因為店名聽起來像是
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 小館比較像是老闆可能不是太專業的廚師但他對自己的私房菜有一些興趣有一些自信的人他會出來開這種
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 哦,所以比較像是家庭風格的廚房所以不是為了大客人,不太詳細,但比較像是家庭的廚房是的但是這個廚房是什麼?因為我們有浙江風格,我們有台灣風格,而這間是什麼?這間是傑森很愛的餐廳,他來台灣四次都來這一間真的嗎?他來台灣四次?四次,是的

chunks.chunk_text: 所以傑森是來自四川的廚房,這真有趣我覺得傑森大多是在美國長大了,所以他比較像是西方人的口味他會離辭於辣的食物,四川的食物應該是辣的,對嗎?嗯嗯,你猜傑森最愛的菜是什麼?我不知道外國人聽到蒼蠅頭感覺怎麼樣?蝴蝶頭?真正的蝴蝶頭?當然不是
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 所以蒼蠅頭是這道菜的名字嗎?嗯嗯這聽起來不太好吃,聽起來很難吃所以蒼蠅頭是什麼?我知道蝴蝶頭,但不知道蒼蠅頭蒼蠅頭通常是用蜜蜂肉和蟹肉蜂肉和蟹肉?嗯嗯所以蒼蠅頭在哪裡?蝴蝶頭在哪裡?為什麼?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 所以蒼蠅頭是用蜜蜂肉做成的大塊,對嗎?所以它不是用蜜蜂肉做成的很小塊,而是用蜜蜂肉做成的小塊所以它不是蜜蜂肉,而是一塊小塊的蜜蜂肉當你炒的時候,它就像蝴蝶頭一樣,很有趣所以為什麼他們不稱它為炒蜜蜂肉?為什麼他們要稱它為蒼蠅頭?這太奇怪了吧?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 當時他們覺得蒼蠅頭好吃但蝴蝶頭在另一邊是一塊蜜蜂肉,對嗎?對,蜜蜂肉蒼蠅頭是小塊的蜜蜂肉它不是蜜蜂肉,而是一塊蜜蜂肉炒得很軟,看起來像蝴蝶頭花娘小館的花蝴蝶餐廳,我覺得廚師是會做蒼蠅頭一整天,對嗎?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 對,給我蒼蠅餐廳,蒼蠅餐廳有什麼?給我蒼蠅餐廳的所有食材所以這是四川廚師,很有趣幸好這不是私人廚房,所以很適合你,蒼蠅
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 你吃完火鍋,流了滿身汗之後,你可以吃冰淇淋
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 然後吃冰淇淋最重要的是火鍋,對嗎?現在,當我開始在台灣做朋友的時候他們開始邀請我去辣辣的火鍋餐廳你知道嗎?我不是很喜歡辣辣的辣食物哦?而且每個人都想吃辣辣的火鍋,幾乎每個星期的程度這是另一個文化衝擊,我不明白它的表現它超級辣,咬我的嘴巴,燒焦
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 老撈麻辣火鍋
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 這是台灣辣辣的火鍋除了辣辣的火鍋之外,你會說它是台北10名嗎?其實我對火鍋沒什麼興趣你不喜歡火鍋嗎?對你不是台灣人嗎?你剛才說你可以先吃火鍋,然後再吃冰淇淋我可以選擇什麼?你不常常選擇火鍋嗎?對,我不常常選擇火鍋你通常選擇什麼?我通常選擇麵條麵條?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 所以你比較喜歡吃麵條麵條?麵條麵條,或是燒焦,OK燒焦和麵條,沒問題但火鍋不適合老撈火鍋,坦白說我還沒試過這個但我聽過其他辣辣的火鍋餐廳在台北的火鍋超級受歡迎,包括我的朋友我們有丁王哦,丁王然後原來Andy Lau和香港歌手香港的名人他們喜歡去泰河店我聽過了
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 然後在台北的火鍋餐廳,我猜是麻辣,人們會去那裡我曾經跟我的新加坡朋友去那裡,她說這不是辣的但我沒有試過,我嘴巴不舒服我沒有喜歡,因為太不舒服了但我的新加坡朋友說這不是太辣,還可以吧對我來說已經太辣了,所以不要
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 不喜歡吃辣的火鍋餐廳,請讓我們知道,給我們一些建議,好嗎?我們繼續到下一個,因為這一個很接近我們煮熟的豬肉和米飯,但這只是豬肉丸,我們剛才提到的富巴王,所以這是現在的台北鄉鄉鎮有這個,故事是當他離開了餐廳,富巴王,有人在網上,我不知道是否真的,有人在網上
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 想買一些東西,過去了,想買一些東西,而這個人,這位網友,他拍了一張照片,然後富巴王離開後,富巴王其實賣出來了,他們在清理,所以我不知道如果富巴王點了最後一份食物,或是如果富巴王買了一些食物,他買了一切,對,這就是這個地方很受歡迎的,豬肉丸,富巴王,絕對是一個一定要試的東西
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 我聽過很多好東西,但這條路是很長的,即使是在鄉鎮前來的,所以我對這條路很不耐煩,所以如果你們有試過富巴王的話,請讓我知道,然後我們到下一個,你最喜歡的,Clem,他常來的,如果你來台灣,如果你試過辣椒火鍋,如果你吃過沙龍堡的醬汁,和煮熟的豬肉和米飯,而你不吃牛肉麵,你就很笨,因為台灣很受歡迎吃牛肉麵,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 你今天要做牛耳精緻麵館
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 這是牛肉麵的大大大大塊肉,非常非常好,Genson,你知道你的牛肉嗎?好,這就是你在牛肉麵店裡想要的,大塊牛肉,好嗎?這就是你的方向,但是在牛肉麵店裡想要的東西是什麼?因為這就是這道菜的心,如果你的牛肉麵,你的牛肉很棒,那你的麵呢?Clem,你覺得在牛肉麵餐廳,牛肉更重要還是麵?我覺得是麵
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 對我來說,牛肉必須很棒,沒有兩種方法,牛肉必須有一個標準,但是麵,有時候,如果麵不好吃,就很失望,是很失望的,所以你最喜歡的牛肉麵餐廳是什麼?這是Genson的牛肉麵餐廳嗎?你覺得是好的嗎?還是你有更好的建議?我從來沒有去過這個餐廳,但內湖是很遠的
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 你必須把MRT帶到另一邊去,我覺得附近的MRT站是西湖,對嗎?對,西湖站,那是在內湖的另一邊,好嗎?所以你最喜歡的牛肉麵餐廳是什麼?不要告訴我三桑橋府,那是我最愛的你不會相信我吧,如果我告訴你三桑橋府是我的最愛自從你跟我說曾先生是你的最愛之後,我就...你相信我吧,我是便宜的
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 你知道嗎?當我第一次到台灣,所有東西都很貴因為我需要把西湖的銀行轉成NT的錢,所以我都覺得,天啊,這個...任何肉類的東西都很貴,我沒有用到貨幣,那時候三桑橋府有在週末69NT牛肉麵餐廳,你沒想到,我一整年都在那裡
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 每個週末,午餐,我都在三桑橋府,你能想像嗎?我相信你相信我,然後每個星期我都會去曾先生那裡,只是為了給自己一個禮物
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 那種牛肉麵餐廳,三桑橋府的質素,還有三桑橋府的壽司是當時已經是一種質素的食物給我,是一種質素的食物給我,是一種我從來沒有吃過的食物在南非,所以對我來說是一種好食物,你知道嗎?我都很滿意每個時候我都會回到三桑橋府,只是為了品嘗,只是為了再次感到開心,我還是這樣做的,三桑橋府...
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 三桑橋府是在我去卡拉福,有時候他們在卡拉福附近開店,所以我會去卡拉福購物,然後我會去三桑橋府,那是我,我會吃牛肉麵,不管現在的情況,我還是很享受,因為那是我最初在台北的一段很重要的一段回憶,你知道嗎?然後最後一個?最後一個,Fancy風格的餐廳,或是台灣人餐廳,但是我們Fancy的餐廳,那是什麼餐廳呢?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 這家其實我以前就很想去吃,我記得大概2000,也是2000塊差不多。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 我們可以說是廚師品嘗的餐廳,然後餐廳是台灣風格的餐廳,然後當然,接下來的三個會是,寧夏夜市,他去吃圓環邊的牛肉麵,然後他去吃豆腐布丁,也是在寧夏,然後他買了一些水果,當然這次他在另一個夜市去吃,不是這個。大家去看看吧,寧夏夜市的水果女士。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 然後他也買了一些烤肉,還有烤肉牛肉麵,在五燈獎,這是在山窗。然後他買了一些豆腐布丁在里園,這是在台北的附近。然後花樓餐廳也是在台北的附近,是嗎?在那個同一個鄰居,我覺得。花樓餐廳的花樓小館是四川風格的,當然,當你講四川風格的時候,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 如果是烤肉的話,那會是愛因斯坦,那會是德國愛因斯坦,是嗎?是不一樣的。台灣的豆腐布丁通常是烤肉的。然後牛肉麵餐廳,尼爾印內戶,去試試看吧,牛肉麵餐廳。然後當然,最後,但不是最少,是私人廚房,春酒,私人廚房,大概3,080美金。所以大家,如果你們來到這間餐廳,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 就知道他在過去的旅行中經常去參觀。我覺得他下次去參觀的時候,他必須去嘗試其他東西,真的。在花樓餐廳四次,拜託,傑恩森。但克林,回來了,我們要談談我們的情況。傑恩森在台灣的廚藝和台北的餐廳,你開心嗎?對,我很開心。我覺得這點很不合理。真的嗎?我不開心。為什麼?因為現在我無法去
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 任何餐廳吃飯。你知道嗎?我特別留意到傑恩森的電子電腦,傑恩森也發了一番說話,在我認為是泰達的地方。那幾天,我爸爸說,我們去吃飯吧。你知道嗎?我們找不到一個地方。我們去到所有的餐廳,但找不到一張座椅。那是最糟糕的。傑恩森讓大家想吃飯。我心想,這是王先生的力量,對吧?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 他真的讓大家想吃飯。我還留意到,在Instagram上,有更多的Instagram食物專頁。因為人們會去傑恩森的餐廳拍照,然後說,除了傑恩森的餐廳之外,你可以試這個餐廳。所以傑恩森不僅為了推廣台北的食物,他也為我們推廣了台北的食物。所以現在,我最好的朋友是麥當勞。他只為了推廣麥當勞。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 所以我對他有點不開心。你說太多了,傑恩森!閉嘴!你感覺怎樣?我不覺得。你不覺得?為什麼我會這樣?很奇怪。這裡,我試過在一些普通的熱鍋餐廳訂單。我無法拿座椅。我只是無法拿。我不知道為什麼。很難。熱鍋。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 傑恩森的餐廳,忘記了。傑恩森在這裡的時候,人們都在不同的餐廳,嘗試捉捉傑恩森。在現場拍攝。因為傑恩森的推廣,例如圓形牛排、牛肉。我不知道。我會等一年。等一年,直到傑恩森的瘋狂死亡。在我再次帶爸爸去Ninja的時候。所以,Clem,今天來介紹一下。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 不需要特別吃的。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 然後,傑恩森的Taipei Food Map會變成五分之五。那是必要的。好,所以Clem,一定要更新傑恩森。好嗎?今天謝謝大家的參與,談論傑恩森的Taipei Food Map。如果你有任何意見或想法,或者你嘗試了整個傑恩森的食物圖案,請讓我們知道。我們非常驕傲。我們非常驕傲。你真的是一名食師。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 如果你沒有嘗試過,別擔心,我沒有試過任何東西。所以別擔心,你是我的一方。如果我們在未來嘗試過,我們會讓你們知道。我們會跟你們分享我們的想法。如果你們想知道更多Foodie的食物圖案,請發給我們請求的參與者。Clem和我,我們會去探索文章、報道,以及所有有趣的Foodie的食物圖案,跟你們分享。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 現在,我想介紹一些更新的食物圖案。來聽聽,大家!
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json

chunks.chunk_text: 無燈醬豬肉糠是非常有名的,因為創始人Miss Wang參與了無燈醬的演唱會,就像阿梅一樣,她有五個等級。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.225_ 來試試黃大老闆的美食地圖 2024 Jensen Huangs Taipei food map.json
